name: CAVOK Aviation Training
about: CAVOK Aviation Training, located at Gödöllő Airfield near Budapest, Hungary, is a premier flight school founded by experienced airline pilots. We offer comprehensive training programs from ab-initio to professional multi-pilot courses, including EASA LAPL, PPL, CPL, IR, and frozen ATPL licenses. Our fleet includes modern aircraft such as the Viper SD-4, Tecnam P2002-JF, Aero AT-3, Cessna 172, and Piper Seneca. With a team of highly qualified instructors, many of whom are retired airline and military pilots, we provide efficient and professional training. Our students benefit from flexible modular courses, state-of-the-art simulators, and a supportive environment that ensures high success rates in airline interviews. We are committed to providing top-notch training that prepares aspiring pilots for successful careers in aviation. Join us to take your aviation career to new heights.
services: ["Single Modular Course\n0-ATPL Airline Program\nVFR to ME-IR Program"]
